title: Azure Data Migration Service Resource Provider
description: The Data Migration Service helps people migrate their data from on-premise database servers to Azure, or from older database software to newer software. The service manages one or more workers that are joined to a customer's virtual network, which is assumed to provide connectivity to their databases. To avoid frequent updates to the resource provider, data migration tasks are implemented by the resource provider in a generic way as task resources, each of which has a task type (which identifies the type of work to run), input, and output. The client is responsible for providing appropriate task type and inputs, which will be passed through unexamined to the machines that implement the functionality, and for understanding the output, which is passed back unexamined to the client.

Operations_List.title: Get available resource provider actions (operations)
Operations_List.description: Lists all available actions exposed by the Data Migration Service resource provider.

Services_CheckNameAvailability.title: Check name validity and availability
Services_CheckNameAvailability.description: This method checks whether a proposed top-level resource name is valid and available.

Usages_List.title: Get resource quotas and usage information
Usages_List.description: This method returns region-specific quotas and resource usage information for the Data Migration Service.

Services_List.title: Get services in subscription
Services_List.description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Data Migration Service. This method returns a list of service resources in a subscription.

ResourceSkus_ListSkus.title: Get supported SKUs
ResourceSkus_ListSkus.description: The skus action returns the list of SKUs that DMS supports.

Services_ListByResourceGroup.title: Get services in resource group
Services_ListByResourceGroup.description: The Services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Data Migration Service. This method returns a list of service resources in a resource group.

Services_Delete.title: Delete DMS Service Instance
Services_Delete.description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Data Migration Service. The DELETE method deletes a service. Any running tasks will be canceled.

Services_Get.title: Get DMS Service Instance
Services_Get.description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Data Migration Service. The GET method retrieves information about a service instance.

Services_Update.title: Create or update DMS Service Instance
Services_Update.description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Data Migration Service. The PATCH method updates an existing service. This method can change the kind, SKU, and network of the service, but if tasks are currently running (i.e. the service is busy), this will fail with 400 Bad Request ("ServiceIsBusy").

Services_CreateOrUpdate.title: Create or update DMS Instance
Services_CreateOrUpdate.description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Data Migration Service. The PUT method creates a new service or updates an existing one. When a service is updated, existing child resources (i.e. tasks) are unaffected. Services currently support a single kind, "vm", which refers to a VM-based service, although other kinds may be added in the future. This method can change the kind, SKU, and network of the service, but if tasks are currently running (i.e. the service is busy), this will fail with 400 Bad Request ("ServiceIsBusy"). The provider will reply when successful with 200 OK or 201 Created. Long-running operations use the provisioningState property.

Services_CheckChildrenNameAvailability.title: Check nested resource name validity and availability
Services_CheckChildrenNameAvailability.description: This method checks whether a proposed nested resource name is valid and available.

Services_CheckStatus.title: Check service health status
Services_CheckStatus.description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Data Migration Service. This action performs a health check and returns the status of the service and virtual machine size.

Projects_List.title: Get projects in a service
Projects_List.description: The project resource is a nested resource representing a stored migration project. This method returns a list of projects owned by a service resource.

Projects_Delete.title: Delete project
Projects_Delete.description: The project resource is a nested resource representing a stored migration project. The DELETE method deletes a project.

Projects_Get.title: Get project information
Projects_Get.description: The project resource is a nested resource representing a stored migration project. The GET method retrieves information about a project.

Projects_Update.title: Update project
Projects_Update.description: The project resource is a nested resource representing a stored migration project. The PATCH method updates an existing project.

Projects_CreateOrUpdate.title: Create or update project
Projects_CreateOrUpdate.description: The project resource is a nested resource representing a stored migration project. The PUT method creates a new project or updates an existing one.

Tasks_List.title: Get tasks in a service
Tasks_List.description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Data Migration Service. This method returns a list of tasks owned by a service resource. Some tasks may have a status of Unknown, which indicates that an error occurred while querying the status of that task.

Tasks_Delete.title: Delete task
Tasks_Delete.description: The tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The DELETE method deletes a task, canceling it first if it's running.

Tasks_Get.title: Get task information
Tasks_Get.description: The tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The GET method retrieves information about a task.

Tasks_Update.title: Create or update task
Tasks_Update.description: The tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The PATCH method updates an existing task, but since tasks have no mutable custom properties, there is little reason to do so.

Tasks_CreateOrUpdate.title: Create or update task
Tasks_CreateOrUpdate.description: The tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. The PUT method creates a new task or updates an existing one, although since tasks have no mutable custom properties, there is little reason to update an exising one.

Tasks_Cancel.title: Cancel a task
Tasks_Cancel.description: The tasks resource is a nested, proxy-only resource representing work performed by a DMS instance. This method cancels a task if it's currently queued or running.

Services_ListSkus.title: Get compatible SKUs
Services_ListSkus.description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Data Migration Service. The skus action returns the list of SKUs that a service resource can be updated to.

Services_Start.title: Start service
Services_Start.description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Data Migration Service. This action starts the service and the service can be used for data migration.

Services_Stop.title: Stop service
Services_Stop.description: The services resource is the top-level resource that represents the Data Migration Service. This action stops the service and the service cannot be used for data migration. The service owner won't be billed when the service is stopped.
